pr_title: MINOR: fix potential NPE in PartitionData.equals

timeline.bodyText: I believe that one could be easily tempted to remove such assertion without knowing the context. I would add a comment to explain it or define a dedicate test case for the bug. I am fine with either ways.
timeline.author: dajac

replies.bodyText: thanks for this quickly and meaningful review and I will copy that :)
replies.author: chia7712

timeline.message: MINOR: fix potential NPT in PartitionData.equals
